history.proof: intros x. hauto use: norm_compat1 unfold: locally, UniformSpace.sort, NormedModule.UniformSpace, pos, locally_norm, ball_norm, filter_le.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x : V P : V -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball_norm ?M2435 eps y -> P y" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball x eps y -> P y".
